Projects Project Title: Order Management Client: Forescout technologies Nature of Employment: Full Time Duration: Jan 2019 - Aug 2019 Project Location: Bengaluru Onsite / Offsite: Offsite Role: Project Leader Team Size: 8 Skill Used: Tableau, SQL, SSIS Role Description: Development and testing.. Project Details: Order management project consisted of 4 different Tableau workbooks like Sales order details, Invoice Payment details, Processing speed details and Customer payment details This project includes fetching data from database or any other sources like Netsuite, Salesforce etc bringing them into database table's and views, then creating interactive dashboards using tableau for data management and data analysis
